fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
- Base: $25
- With 1 House: $100
- With 2 Houses: $300
- With 3 Houses: $700
- With 4 Houses: $1000
- With 1 Hotel: $1500

Houses Cost $150 each.
Hotels cost $200 plus 4 houses.

fields.name: Drive-by Effects:
fields.value: - Every time TLHP moves past this space, the next d2 roll forced by this space automatically becomes a 2.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - The Potatoes here are so sweet that you just want to stay awhile. If you land here, after taking your turn, roll a d2. If you roll a 2, your roll for your next turn is automatically 0 and you may not leave the space by any means. Since you rolled a 0, this does count as you landing on the space again for the purposes of rent.
